citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:43pm on 13-
March-2023.
The inspector (APHIS official) went to the door of the facility, which had a note taped to the front stating that for Sunrise
Pups to call the number listed below. The inspector called the number listed at 1:43pm. At 1:51pm a facility representative
returned the call. The inspector introduced themself and that they were currently at the facility for an inspection. The
facility representative stated that Mondays are not good for them and there was no one at the facility that could
accompany the inspector throughout the inspection, nor someone who could meet the inspector. The inspector obtained
new optimal hours for the facility from the representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:43pm on 13-
March-2023.  
 
The inspector (APHIS official) went to the door of the facility, which had a note taped to the front stating that for Sunrise 
Pups to call the number listed below. The inspector called the number listed at 1:43pm. At 1:51pm a facility representative 
returned the call. The inspector introduced themself and that they were currently at the facility for an inspection. The 
facility representative stated that Mondays are not good for them and there was no one at the facility that could 
accompany the inspector throughout the inspection, nor someone who could meet the inspector. The inspector obtained 
new optimal hours for the facility from the representative. 
 
 
 
End Section
